channel.title: Dreamweaver Podcasts
channel.itunes:author: Video Tutes.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Free Video Tutorials
channel.itunes:summary:
Welcome to the Video-tutes video podcasts on how to use Dreamweaver 8. Our goal is to teach you how to use the basics of creating web pages and the many features of Dreamweaver 8. Follow along with our free video podcasts as we show you how easy it is to master this great piece of software.
Knowledge in your pocket!

item.title: Text in Layers with Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on Layers in Dreamweaver
item.itunes:subtitle: How to add text to layers and style it with CSS.
item.itunes:summary: How to add a layer and then restyle it with css adding some padding and a new font.
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver, Video tutorial for dreamweaver, video tutorials, vod cast, video podcasting, Dreamweaver video how to

item.title: How to define a new site in Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on how to define your site in Dreamweaver
item.itunes:subtitle: How to set up and define your site in Dreamweaver.
item.itunes:summary: Define you local site in Dreamweaver so you can begin building that killer page.
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver, Video tutorial for dreamweaver, video tutorials, vod cast, video podcasting, Dreamweaver video how to

item.title: Using Find Replace to change multiple items in Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.itunes:subtitle: How to use find and replace to edit source code in web pages
item.itunes:summary: How to use find and replace to complete repeditive tasks in this case delete the first part of a URL.
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver, Video tutorial for dreamweaver, video tutorials, vod cast, video podcasting, Dreamweaver video how to

item.title: How to change status bar message with behaviours
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on behaviours in Dreamweaver
item.itunes:subtitle: How to change the status bar message with behaviours
item.itunes:summary: How to add behaviours so when users mouse over invisable areas the status bar message changes.
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver, Video tutorial for dreamweaver, video tutorials, vod cast, video podcasting, Dreamweaver video how to

item.title: How to add, split and merge table cells
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on editing tables in Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:subtitle: Add a table, split and merge table cells
item.itunes:summary: How to add tables to a web page and then split and merge the table cells.
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver video tutorial, Tables, Video podcast, Macromaedia Dremaweaver

item.title: How to use Dreamweavers FTP server
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on using the FTp from within Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:subtitle: How to use Dreamweaver FTP to upload work
item.itunes:summary: How to use Dreamweaver FTP to upload work
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver video tutorial, how to ftp with dreamweaver

item.title: Dreamweaver how to make file associations
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on how to create file association in Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:subtitle: File association in Dreamweaver
item.itunes:summary: Let Dreamweaver know which editing program to open for a particular file type.
item.itunes:keywords: Linkg programs in dreamweaver, Dreamweaver, video tutorials, Dreamweaver video tutorial, Ipod video

item.title: How to use Dreamweaver8 behaviours to check for plugins
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on how to detect plugins in Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:subtitle: How to detect media plugins and redirect on outcome
item.itunes:summary: Get Dreamweaver to look for plugins and send users to the right pages. Using behaviours make this job simple.
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver video tutorials, Podcasting tutorials, Detect plugins

item.title: How to style the H1 tag with CSS
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on resizing the H1 tag to look like body copy
item.itunes:subtitle: How to use css to control the size of your Heading tags
item.itunes:summary: How to resize the h1 tag smaller to better suit your designs.
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver tutorials, video podcasting, web design, dreamweaver video, video vodcast, free dreamweaver

item.title: How to use the tracing image option in Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on using tracing images in Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracing images in Dreamweaver
item.itunes:summary: How to use tracing images to help with page layout *Note: Tracing images is a term in Deamweaver refering to the use of a locked bottom layer that is used as a page layout guide.
item.itunes:keywords: Tracing Images, Dreamweaver video tutorials, How to use tracing images in Dreamweaver, Video podcast, ipod video

item.title: Dreamweaver XSLT RSS and CSS
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on how to style rss feeds as page content.
item.itunes:subtitle: How to add rss feeds to pages and style it with CSS.
item.itunes:summary: How to link to remote rss feeds, add items to pages and style them with css. Then learn how to import this into prebuilt pages. * Note this tutorial requires a testing server to be installed.
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver, Video tutorial for dreamweaver, video tutorials, vod cast, video podcasting, Dreamweaver video how to

item.title: Animating with Dreamweaver8
item.itunes:author: More video tutorials @ video-tutes.com
item.description: Video tutorial on how to animate layers.
item.itunes:subtitle: How to animate layers using the timeline.
item.itunes:summary: How to animate layers in Dreamweaver8 using the timeline. A great tutorial on this feature!
item.itunes:keywords: Dreamweaver, Video tutorial for dreamweaver, video tutorials, vod cast, video podcasting, Dreamweaver video how to
